books.title: Fantasy in Death

books.title: Jade City

books.synopsis: Jade City is an epic tale of blood, family, honour, and of those who live and die by ancient laws in a changing world.

books.title: House of Sky and Breath

books.synopsis: In this sexy, action-packed sequel to the #1 bestseller House of Earth and Blood, Sarah J. Maas weaves a captivating story of a world about to explode.
